description: Number of right triangles with n as a hypotenuse or leg.

prog: (PARI) a(n) = {oddn = n/(2^valuation(n, 2)); f = factor(oddn); for (k=1, #f~, if ((f[k,1] % 4) != 1, f[k,2] = 0);); n1 = factorback(f); if (n % 2, (numdiv(n^2)+numdiv(n1^2))/2 -1, (numdiv((n/2)^2)+numdiv(n1^2))/2 -1);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 07 2016
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
